mapper.select: select * from game order by game_date desc

select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_img, a.age_grade from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id
and b.detail_id = #{detailId1}
and a.game_id IN ( select a.game_id from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and b.detail_id = #{detailId2})
and a.game_id IN ( select a.game_id from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and b.detail_id = #{detailId3})
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName1} || '%'
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName2} || '%'
and c.detail_name like '%' || #{detailName3} || '%'
and a.game_price <= #{gamePrice}
order by 1
select game_id, game_name, game_price, game_img, age_grade from game where lower(game_name) like lower('%'|| #{gameName} ||'%' )

select a.game_id, a.game_name, a.game_price, a.game_date, a.age_grade, a.game_video, a.game_img, a.game_dev, c.detail_name, d.cate_name, f.pub_name from game a, game_detail b, category_detail c, category d, publish e, publisher f where a.game_id = b.game_id and b.detail_id = c.detail_id and c.cate_id = d.cate_id and a.game_id = e.game_id and e.pub_id = f.pub_id and a.game_id = #{gameId}
SELECT A.GAME_ID FROM GAMECODE A, GAME B WHERE A.GAME_ID = B.GAME_ID AND A.GAME_CODE = #{gameCode}
mapper.insert: insert into game(game_id, game_name, game_price, game_date, game_dev, game_img, game_video, age_grade) values(( 'game' || game_seq.nextval ), #{gameName}, #{gamePrice}, #{gameDate}, #{gameDev}, #{gameImg}, #{gameVideo}, #{ageGrade})
mapper.update: update game set game_name = #{gameName}, game_price = #{gamePrice}, game_date = #{gameDate}, game_dev = #{gameDev}, game_img = #{gameImg}, game_video = #{gameVideo}, age_grade = #{ageGrade} where game_id = #{gameId}
mapper.select: select c.game_id from member a, cart b, cart_game c, orders d where a.mem_id = b.mem_id and b.cart_id = c.cart_id and c.cart_id = d.cart_id and a.mem_id = #{memId}
select game_id from discount where game_id = #{gameId}
